medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms of skeletal muscle weakness have been present since childhood. The patient has neither dyspnea nor palpitation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Becker muscular dystrophy, diagnosed through dystrophin gene analysis.
medical_history.family_history: Becker muscular dystrophy diagnosed in the patient's younger brother, maternal uncle, and maternal nephew.
